Class SchemaLoader

extends java.lang.Object
    Used to load a global schema from all the connected databases' local schemas

    • Method Detail

      • loadGlobalSchemaOnConnectionPool

        public static GlobalSchema loadGlobalSchemaOnConnectionPool(ConnectionPool connectionPool,
                                                            MetadataDb metadataDb)
        Static method that is used to load a relevant global schema from connected databases
        Parameters:
        connectionPool - Connection pool containing all relevant database connections
        metadataDb - Metadata database object holding a connection to a database describing global metadata and settings
        Returns:
        GlobalSchema object that holds the current status of the global schema
